original_text: They are as stubble before the wind, and as chaff that the storm carrieth away.
korean_text: 그들이 바람 앞에 검불 같이, 폭풍에 날려가는 겨 같이 되었도다

sentences.original_text: They are as stubble before the wind
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 바람 앞에 있는 검불과 같고

sentences.original_text: and as chaff that the storm carrieth away
